skills.name: Unlimited Free Drinks
skills.desc: Deals 4 hits of Ice DMG to one random target. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to self with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

skills.name: Limited Free Drinks
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to this unit with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

skills.name: Celebration Fountain
skills.desc: Enters the Charge stage and gains Toughness Protection. Uses Unlimited Free Drinks during the next action.
